content: full length 15 ¾ -17 -18 -19 materials drops alpaca from garnstudio 100-150-150-150 g color no 8105 light gray-blue and use drops vivaldi from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes color no 24 light violet drops crochet hook size 5 mm / us h/8 - or the crochet hook size needed to obtain correct crochet gauge crochet gauge 4 treble_crochet = 1 treble_crochet group + 4 chain must measure 6 cm / 2 3/8 in width with 1 thread of each yarn quality = 2 threads
